short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that save Chat to doc file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily save and organize your ChatGPT conversations with our specialized Chrome extension! Whether you're using ChatGPT for work, research, or casual conversations, you can now preserve important chats directly into .docx files for easy access and sharing. With Save Chat to DOC, you can:

One-click save: Instantly export your ChatGPT conversations to .docx format.
Seamless organization: Keep your important chats neatly stored and easily retrievable.
Simple and intuitive: With a user-friendly interface, saving conversations has never been this easy.
This extension is perfect for anyone who relies on ChatGPT for generating ideas, drafting content, or managing tasks. Keep your conversations organized and accessible at any time!

Key Features:

Exclusive support for ChatGPT.com conversations
Exports chats directly to .docx format
Clean and intuitive user interface
